properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 2:33PM EST until March 4 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 knots Tuesday becoming westerly and
increasing to 30 knots late in the day Tuesday, then continuing
Tuesday night before decreasing to 10 to 20 knots during the day
on Wedneday. Waves will build to 4 to 6 feet by mid afternoon
Tuesday and to 6 to 8 feet Tuesday night before subisiding to 3
to 5 feet during the day Wednesday.


* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...From 7 AM Tuesday to 4 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TUESDAY TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY
